group_1.textLeft: [chara:102401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whoa! Don't just come back without saying@a word like this, you’d scare me.
And next time, call me if you’re gonna be late, ‘kay?@I gotta know when dinner’s gonna be.
You seem awfully quiet.@Quarrellin’ at work again?

group_1.textRight: Naw, just tryin’ to figure out how@to beat the shit outta someone.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, don't get yourself sacked or anything, hear?
If you get too carried away,@I’m gonna blow off school.
Better spend the money on food than on going@to some bloody expensive all-girls' school.

group_1.textRight: Don't jump to conclusions, girl.@Was only talkin’ about business.
Y’know, the housing estate that's on sale@is now up for grabs with some other guys.
And their sales rep is a fella I lost to before.
That’s why I been thinkin’ a lot.@It’s lousy to keep losing.
The relationship between the two companies’@a tad concerning.
But I still wanna settle my previous score…
I get business rep if we win,@and that means tasty food in our bellies.

group_1.textLeft: Look, you don't gotta sweat that, 'kay?@'S all the same once it goes in the piehole.

group_1.textRight: I promise, next birthday I'll take you to@a fancy-ass restaurant, hehe!

group_1.textLeft: You know we don't belong somewhere like that,@but hell, gonna have my fingers crossed.[chara:102401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102401:cheek_0][chara:102401:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:102401:motion_200][chara:102401:lipSynch_1] Heehee!

group_1.textRight: Oh, and Juri, don't go blowing off school@or anything, hear?
It's the first school that gave you@a fightin' chance, yeah?

group_1.narration: From junior high till I started at my current school,@I acted out whenever something didn't sit right@with me, refused to work in groups,@and constantly got myself into trouble.@All of this gave my old man a hard time.
I know how hard it must’ve been for my@young father to raise me all by himself.@I don't wanna cause him any more@problems than I already have…
That's why I gotta endure now…@Not that I like it either,@but when I was a brat,@I couldn't control myself…
But, not anymore…@Now that I'm a Magical Girl, I can hold back…@‘cause I’ve gained the power to endure stress,@and the world to release it…

group_1.textCenter: I’m looking forward to working for you!

group_1.textRight: Because it’s my pleasure to be of service to you,@Juri.

group_1.textLeft: (Just how much longer can I endure…?)

group_1.textCenter: My patience’s gonna run out sooner or later…@It's looking a lot like “sooner”…
